title: High School Soccer: Glastonbury Vs. Hall
text:
Caption High School Soccer: Glastonbury Vs. Hall Stephen Dunn Hall's goalie Claudia Hess loses this save for Galstonbury's first goal the first half. Glastonbury beat Hall 3-0 on the Glastonbury field Thursday.
